comments.body:
Should there be a `CDP` version with callback function?:
https://unpkg.com/browse/chrome-remote-interface@0.30.1/index.js

Yes 53e2027 sorry oversight ... was exclusively looking at a different file ([lib/devtools.js](https://github.com/cyrus-and/chrome-remote-interface/blob/v0.30.1/lib/devtools.js)) than the one above.

The callback type definition is based on https://github.com/cyrus-and/chrome-remote-interface/blob/v0.30.1/index.js#L19. I don't see an attachment to the `error` event, just [a comment](https://github.com/cyrus-and/chrome-remote-interface/blob/v0.30.1/index.js#L15) stating that the error callback can be registered later. Not sure how connection errors (e.g. incorrect port) can be handled though if so.
